Plot: An examination of a failure of justice in the case against the West Memphis Three.
Title: West of Memphis
Actors: Michael Baden, Jason Baldwin, Holly Ballard, Jamie Clark Ballard
tomatoConsensus: Both a sobering look at a true crime story and a scathing indictment of the American justice system, West of Memphis is a real-life horror story told with fury and compassion.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 9 nominations.
